title: Udayan attempting to create bad image about Lanka – Maj Gen Hathurusinghe
content: The Udayan newspaper yesterday reported that the Sri Lanka Navy had anchored a number of its Fast Attack Craft near Kachchathivu Island. The report said the craft have being anchored there to threaten Tamil Nadu fishermen. Udayan is attempting to create a bad image about Sri Lanka among Tamils in Tamil Nadu by publishing articles…
